titles.title: State and Local Government Participation Act of 2003
A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy At of 1969 to require that Federal agencies consult with State agencies and county and local governments on environmental impact statements.
State and Local Government Participation Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: State and Local Government Participation Act of 2003 - Amends the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 to require Federal officials, prior to making environmental impact statements on proposed actions and legislative proposals, to obtain the comments of Federal and State agencies and county and local governments (currently, Federal agencies) which have jurisdiction or special expertise with respect to involved environmental impacts.
